channel.title: Agm on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Agm on UN-aligned

item.title: UN-aligned's 2023 Annual General Meeting
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: We are thrilled to extend an invitation to all our members for the UN-aligned 2023 Annual General Meeting, scheduled for Thursday, December 14th, 2023.

item.title: UN-aligned Annual General Meeting 2022
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description:
We are pleased to invite you to UN-aligned’s 2022 Annual General Meeting.

The Annual General Meeting is a special occasion for the exchange of information and discussion between UN-aligned members across the world. 

It is also an opportunity for you to express yourself and play an active role in the major decisions of the organisation.

Below you will find the agenda and instructions on how to participate in this meeting.

item.title: “With a democratic world federation, humanity can address global problems”
item.author: Eston McKeague
item.description: Humanity has been taking the easy path for far too long and we are the unfortunate generation that has to get off the couch and into the trenches.

item.title: UN-aligned's first Annual General Meeting
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description:
UN-aligned’s first AGM was held on Wednesday, November 24th, 2021, at 19:30 - 20:30 (EET) on Google Meet. The proposals included in the agenda of UN-aligned’s AGM, together with this invitation, the NGO’s Financial Statement and the Auditor’s Report are all available on this page.

Invitation

We are pleased to invite you to UN-aligned’s first Annual General Meeting. The Annual General Meeting is a special occasion for the exchange of information and discussion between UN-aligned members across the world.
